item.title: TCN
item.description: score:124 Chances: Institutional advisory firms ISS and Glass Lewis recommending a vote “FOR” the resolution Consolidated financial results for the three and twelve months ended December 31, 2023 were announced Private equity acquisition deal valued at $3.5 billion Shares surged with higher than average trading volume Tricon owns 7 million units in major markets such as Atlanta, Charlotte, Tampa, Dallas, Phoenix, and more Risks: Interim order granted by the Ontario Superior Court in connection with the statutory plan of arrangement Earnings and revenue surprises for Cushman & Wakefield and CBRE may indicate potential market impact Latest trend in earnings estimate revisions may not lead to further price increase Score:124 chances characters count - risks characters count = 124
